website_summaries.verdict: Focuses closely on materials that will be on master's exam. Author is trusted in the field of social work.
pros: Focuses on what you need to know to have success with he master's test
Updated with content to match recent changes to the test
Practice test helps you figure out the correct answers with explanations
cons: Typographical and grammatical errors are unsettling

customer_reviews.title: This Has Not Been Updated to Include the 2017 NASW Code of Ethics
customer_reviews.text: This review guide claims to reflect the 2018 blueprint of the ASWB exam. However, all ethics questions refer to a 2006 version of the NASW Code of Ethics. The code of ethics is a substantial part of the exam and many of the questions and answer explanations do not reflect what will be on the test. It is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Buy the book
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book at the end of February and my LMSW exam was at the end of March. I used only this book to study & I passed it on the 1st try! The book was really helpful, especially the practice test at the back. My only recommendation would be for the next book to structure the practice questions as they are on the exam. In addition to this book, PLEASE TAKE THE ASWB ONLINE PRACTICE EXAM!!! That's what's MOST helpful!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great generalist review
customer_reviews.text: I studied using this edition, along with the app, for a month. Passed my first try with a great score! It was a great generalist review of the SW profession. During testing, I was able to vividly recall material straight from this book
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: The app
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this book and the app doesn’t work with IOS (Apple products). You can still use the information on a computer or android. Let the studying begin and the price dropped less than a week of my purchase 😠
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: Good study guide
customer_reviews.text: I passed my LMSW test on the first try with this as the only study material!!! I would definitely recommend the book for its content and practice test. I will say that the actual test is very different from this practice test in the book as the real tests involves more questions “what do you do FIRST and what do you do NEXT?” This guide makes it pretty easy to narrow down to two answers whereas the actual test is not that easy. Study all the content and know it! Supervisory and ethics played a big part in this test. Be more prepared for simple application questions than objective content...
customer_reviews.author: Casey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: easy to understand and has ALL you NEED to pass ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are planning to take the MSW exam this is a must have. Very well written, easy to understand and has ALL you NEED to pass the exam. It definitely worked for me!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Just get the app-mistakes in the book
customer_reviews.text: The book is an in-depth reading summary of information covered in the masters program. The test at the end is helpful but there are too many answers that are incorrect. The company must have corrected them in the digital app so it is more helpful. I actually learned wrong things from the book practice and was glad to find the corrections with the online companion practice. I would not recommend paying for the book.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight Reader

customer_reviews.title: This book also gives great tips. I felt very prepared for the test ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this book along with the MSW pocket prep app. The app corresponds with this book and give a detailed explaination of the question and answers along with page numbers from the book. This book also gives great tips. I felt very prepared for the test and passed on my 1st try with a great score!
customer_reviews.author: Jtaylor

customer_reviews.title: I Passed with an 80
customer_reviews.text: I can not emphasize how important it is for you to get this book if you are studying for your LMSW exam! This books helped me pass! I was super nervous about taking my exam and failing it but I committed to studying using this book and taking the practice test and I passed with an 80! I highly recommend this oppose to taking a class. I am more of a self taught studying guy and this helped a lot! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Ebook was helpful
customer_reviews.text: I rented the ebok to study for my ASWB master's exam. Reading through the book helped me figure out where my deficits were and helped me have an idea of what would be on the exam. It's not perfect. It doesn't cover everything and shouldn't be your only study material. BUT I passed my exam so this helped. The test in the back of the book was also helpful.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Passed. Helpful to skim.
customer_reviews.text: I PASSED THE MSW THE FIRST TIME!!! I feel this book is a great review but overwhelming!! Helpful hint: only review things you REALLY need to be refreshed on!! The exam in the back was hard, and way more recall questions than the exam, or at least the definition questions. I think skimming this book and taking the ASWB was most helpful.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonX

customer_reviews.title: Great book! Practice questions are a tad more difficult than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to study for my LGSW Exam, I passed on my first try. I found the content to be really helpful. It's a lot of content to cram into one book, as it is a lot of content to cram into an exam. I will say though that the practice questions of this prep book were a tad more difficult than I expected- however, it was a useful tool to know where you are with content knowledge none the less.
customer_reviews.author: J Y

customer_reviews.title: Useful study material for LMSW exam
customer_reviews.text: I used this book as my primary study material for the LMSW licensing exam. While it is a thick book with a lot of information, it was helpful in preparing for the exam. There were some questions on the exam that were not in the book, but I still passed the exam with the information I studied from the book. While the exams are not all the same, I can not guarantee the same results for everyone who uses this book, but I do not have any negative reviews. I bought the book used so I did not utilize the app that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Good Study Guide!
customer_reviews.text: I just graduated with my MSW in May, and studied with this book as well as the pocket prep app for about a month. This book is a great comprehensive overview of material that we have all learned, and was great for reviewing. The practice questions were also helpful in figuring out HOW the exam wants you to answer. I passed the LMSW exam on my first try today! I will definitely buy the clinical version when I take that in a few years!
customer_reviews.author: Emma E.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize I had purchased the online version till I received the bar code. However, I have to say I found the digital version user friendly. The two practice tests were great. I Used some supplemental material for the DSM. I received my MSW six years ago so I definitely needed a refresher. After about six months of studying I took the exam and PASSED on the first try . No prep class or anything like that. I really just studied the material and honestly didn’t even study the last section.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Did not help me pass
customer_reviews.text: I studied for my lsw using this book, inside and out. Did not pass exam. This book contained NO questions that were similar on the actual LSW. I'm going to LEAP products instead to study for take 2 of the LSW exam.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: i passed my test, however..
customer_reviews.text: I read through this book and utilized the practice exam at the end. While this book does go over some foundational content which is applicable to the exam, overall the content is redundant and irrelevant. The practice exam in the back of this book is extremely different than the practice exam offered through the ASWB or the actual exam itself. Multiple licensed social workers I have spoken to have stated that the practice exam offered through the ASWB was the most helpful thing in preparing for the actual exam and understanding how its questions are formatted, which I 100% agree with. For the money I spent on this book, it was disappointingly ineffective as an exam prep tool.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Barnreiter

customer_reviews.title: With this I passed my exam the first try!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I did it. I have an LCSW(not to be confused with the LCSW-clinical license as in MA the 'C' stands for certified). With this comprehensive and thurough study guide i was able to pass my exam the first time. I felt so prepared after using this. I would say, pair this study guide with an online prep app, as the exam is computer based and using a phone app you will get into the patterning needed to succeed in the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Grant F. Pike

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before ordering
customer_reviews.text: There was very little in this book that was on the actual exam, which I took today for the first time and did not pass (by two questions!), as my exam happened to be comprised of essentially all macro questions, and I am a clinical social worker. For my next exam I will look at alternatives for macro preparation (though as my luck goes, the next exam will be heavily clinical)...
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great Study Guide
customer_reviews.text: This study guide for the ASWB exam is great. It has a lot of review material and a practice test. There is also a code to put on a phone/tablet. I used this and passed on the first time. I also used the BSW guide for that exam and passed on the first time. A must have for anyone looking to pass the Master's Exam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All you need to pass the LGSW
customer_reviews.text: Other than the Code of Ethics, this is the only study material I used. Great comprehensive book to prep for the LGSW exam! Be aware that the app is the same exact content as the book, so if you don't want it in both mediums I recommend only purchasing one!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Hauf

customer_reviews.title: Product Malfunction - 2 Cards no access
customer_reviews.text: Where is the code? I ordered this after realizing this is not the book - but was willing to deal with it. Lightly scratched and no code....help
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Did exactly what it said on the tin...!
customer_reviews.text: This was a super purchase! It offers excellent tips and strategies to prepping for this challenging exam. It conditioned me to understand the method of the questions and not just knowledge. I just passed the first time! This was incredible because I trained in the UK and not USA. This study kit prepared me to pass what better review can one give?
customer_reviews.author: swordfish

customer_reviews.title: Careful scratching the App code
customer_reviews.text: I can't access any of the online/phone application benefits, because the code scratched off entirely when I tried to reveal it. I thought I was gentle enough, but who knows. Otherwise, the book contains all the information necessary for review. Very thorough outlines of major topics covered on the exam. I've been out of the field for almost 8 years and want to transition back into social work, so I'd like to take the exam. I'm happy with the content, I just wish I can access the app.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This book is great and very helpful. I recommend it to anyone having challenges with acing the exam!
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Not a useful study tool
customer_reviews.text: I mostly ended up using this for the practice exam on the app. I passed my LMSW exam, but this book didn’t have much to do with it. If I had it to do over I would have just bought the practice exams from the testing company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great if you want to study/brush up on content for exam
customer_reviews.text: I passed!! This was a great study guide for me. I was intending to read the whole thing but it was a lot so I went through the table of contents and highlighted the sections I wanted to study. It also helped to read it and write it down for memorization. The practice test was hard but it really tests you on your knowledge so don't take it until you are ready. I used this and a few other practice exams.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Rose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tool for Passing the ASWB Exam
customer_reviews.text: This was the only book that I used to study for the ASWB exam. I passed on the first attempt. It is easy to read and is comprehensive. I strongly recommend this book!
customer_reviews.author: School Administrator Scott

customer_reviews.title: Only used this to study and passed!
customer_reviews.text: I am not recommending that you do this, but I had very limited time to study. I read this book in full the day before the test, took the practice exam, and then took the test the next day and passed with a high score. This book is a great overview of material, it will not teach you everything and does not really help you answer scenario questions but it helped me a lot, obviously! Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Caputo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the price! Incredibly helpful and provides answers to any questions you could have about the exam itself, how to study best, how to prepare for the stress of the test, a practice test and more.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Maybe just get the app, which is far more useful than the book.
customer_reviews.text: I passed the exam with a 97%. The book is useful but the app/online content was more helpful to be honest. Pretty sure you can buy the stand-alone all.
customer_reviews.author: J. hahn

customer_reviews.title: I passed my test!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this book and several other study aides for my LMSW. The most difficult test I've ever taken, btw!!! I studied for months. But I passed!!! Woo!!! I would never have passed without this book.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I cannot attest to results as of yet. But I can say that the book has a very organized layout and presents information about how the test is setup which provides great insight for one's approach to testing.
customer_reviews.author: LLR

customer_reviews.title: Good Reaource
customer_reviews.text: The book really helped me prepare for the licensing exam. I passed! However, l used the pocket prep in conjunction with this book. The pocket prep helped me with the way that questions are asked during the exam
customer_reviews.author: Toko

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for the ASWB exam
customer_reviews.text: This book was a major help to me with taking the ASWB master’s exam. I studied this book for roughly one month before testing. I would also HIGHLY recommend purchasing the practice exam through the ASWB. These two-together-really helped.
customer_reviews.author: okiemomof3

customer_reviews.title: Worth having
customer_reviews.text: The test in the back was helpful. It is worth having.
customer_reviews.author: Z,J,D&andD, a Family Co.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this manual! It includes all the information needed to study for the exam- there’s no need to go dig up your school books & notes... it’s all in this manual! I took test once & passed it first time, thanks to this manual!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Cash

customer_reviews.title: This is not Second Edition!!!  Don't be fooled!
customer_reviews.text: I paid the price believing the product description "Second Edition," and whoa it was the first edition. I've been trying to cancel/return but see how it goes...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... the information needed to pass the exam in an easy to read format
customer_reviews.text: This textbook provides all of the information needed to pass the exam in an easy to read format. I used this book along with purchasing the $85 ASWB practice exam and passed on my first try.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great resource for the NSW Exam!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my daughter and she read and applied what she learned and passed the Louisiana License Exam 1st try.
customer_reviews.author: Kermit

customer_reviews.title: Easy presentation
customer_reviews.text: Tons of stuff not actually on the exam....but you never know and it felt comforting having this.
customer_reviews.author: NMDAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for studying for my test. The practice test was the best! And for a great price! Definitely recommend..
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Useful information
customer_reviews.text: The book is a great study guide, especially if you’re a person who needs a refresher from school
customer_reviews.author: Veronica F.

customer_reviews.title: Used this and passed my exam on the first try!
customer_reviews.text: This book was a great study tool. Passed the exam on the first try!
customer_reviews.author: T.O.

customer_reviews.title: Good material. Poor printing.
customer_reviews.text: The material is very helpful. My compliant is that the words are cut off or smudged on several pages.
customer_reviews.author: KayTay

customer_reviews.title: New content for 2018 social work exam but noticed some ...
customer_reviews.text: New content for 2018 social work exam but noticed some typos and the app doesn’t work. Received a new book (easy exchange/no issues) but app still does not work. Logged in once and when I went to log in again it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Southida Xayachack

customer_reviews.title: Overall good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good overview of what you need for the exam. I know that there’s a layout of DSM-5 topics, but I would have preferred more of the specifications about each disorder within this manual. Also I would have preferred if the study guide specifically addressed what a social worker should do FIRST or NEXT in case examples.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I need a new book at no cost
customer_reviews.text: Although I bought this book awhile ago I am just now reading it for my exam. When I can to chapter 8 most of that section is missing. It contains the context pages. Its really making my study much harder.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Labelle Germany

customer_reviews.title: Good review!
customer_reviews.text: Good book! Toon me a month to work through it... A good general review!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Used not new
customer_reviews.text: My book's app access code was already scratched off and used. This was sold to me new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scratch off poor quality and didnt work price
customer_reviews.text: Disliked.the scratch off bar did not work. Waiting for answer if it will be fixed after calling help line first. Plus then found it much cheaper elsewhere. I guess I should have doublechecked but I will write this to make sure others do
customer_reviews.author: carla hartley

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great Book to study for your LMSW! Wish it was coming with practice test
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not expect customer service if app does not work.
customer_reviews.text: The book is a good study guide. I been having issued with my access code. I have reached out to the company mulitable times, and have gotten no responce.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Graduated 6 years ago, never took the exam! Decided a few months ago it was now or never! This book was my only study guide, read for 2 months! Passed exam on first try!!!! Highly recommend this book!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good investment and book in great condition
customer_reviews.text: PASSED my TEST..... Good investment and book in great condition
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Study tool
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this book very much that I am using to study for my licensure exam. Definitely a must have for Master's Level under the ASWB.
customer_reviews.author: Viola Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Content
customer_reviews.text: It has wonderful content. In order and not all over the place. Loved it. Came in handy for studying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for studying
customer_reviews.text: Pretty helpful for taking the LMSW, thinking of buying a hard copy to be able to easily reference theories.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica La Falce

customer_reviews.title: Great Condition
customer_reviews.text: New condition with usable codes for online and app versions. Everything I expected.
customer_reviews.author: K Gussler

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for MSW graduates
customer_reviews.text: I really found this book helpful, as it provides helpful tips and content is easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great Book
customer_reviews.text: Book is very thorough. I would recommend it to any social worker needing to refresh. The practice test is useful.
customer_reviews.author: mariah

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STUDY GUIDE
customer_reviews.text: This guide is an easy read and appears to be helpful in studying for the LSW test.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Harris-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great book! Has everything you need to know to pass the test!
customer_reviews.text: This book helped me pass my test! I read the entire book and I used all of the helpful tips and strategies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Social Work ASWB Masters Exam Guide, Second Edition: A Comprehensive Study Guide for Success - Book and Free App – Updated ASWB Study Guide Book with a Full ASWB Practice Test
